description: Adds scrollbars to an element when its content overflows its bounds. Scrollbars are shown only if scrolling is necessary.
Adds scrollbars to an element when its content overflows its horizontal bounds. Scrollbars are shown only if scrolling is necessary.
Adds scrollbars to an element when its content overflows its vertical bounds. Scrollbars are shown only if scrolling is necessary.
Content is clipped if necessary to fit into an element. No scrollbars are provided.
Content is clipped if necessary to fit into an element. No horizontal scrollbars are provided.
Content is clipped if necessary to fit into an element. No vertical scrollbars are provided.
Adds scrollbars to an element. Scrollbars are always shown unless always-visible scrollbars are disabled by the operating system.
Adds horizontal scrollbars to an element. Scrollbars are always shown unless always-visible scrollbars are disabled by the operating system.
Adds vertical scrollbars to an element. Scrollbars are always shown unless always-visible scrollbars are disabled by the operating system.
Prevents content within an element from being clipped both horizontally and vertically. Content that overflows the element’s bounds will be visible.
Prevents content within an element from being clipped horizontally. Content that overflows the element’s bounds will be visible.
Prevents content within an element from being clipped vertically. Content that overflows the element’s bounds will be visible.
